name: Chrome Dino Run
description:
Jump and run at desert with the dinosaur which hates cacti!

A 8 bit game comes for the people who loves old-school styled graphics, with a dinosaur at an infinite desert. Your goal is to avoid cacti. On each time you jump onto a cactus, you get one point. Claim that you are the best at this game and show your skills to your friends by doing the highest score!
